long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Additional features for ChatGPT web interface.

* Speak the Message: User can speak their question with the help of this extension in the ChatGPT web page. Follow the below steps to achive:

1. Install the "ChatGPT Customizer" extension from Chrome Web Store.
2. Navigate to the ChatGPT site: https://chat.openai.com, and you should be able to see the Mic button as in the "Screenshot 1".
3. Click the Mic button, and allow Microphone access.
4. Now, Instead of typing, you can speak the question.
5. Whenever you want to speak your question, you can do that by clicking the Mic button and speak.

* Screen recording: User can record their screen and save it as a Video file. Follow below steps to record your screen:

1. There is a Screen record button at the bottom-right corner in ChatGPT website.
2. Click the record button, Then choose the window/tab/screen that you want to record in the "Choose what to share" popup. And, click "Share" to initialize the recording. Now, the screen recording should be initialized.
3. Click "Stop sharing" button to end the recording.
4. Now, the recording should be downloaded as a video file.
